name: Frido
description:
Frido is a simple 3D arcade game for kids and adults inspired by popular arcade games from the 2000s. The player will have to take control of a robot that has fallen into the past and do everything to help him return home. As the game progresses, you will need to collect parts and solve simple puzzles.
3D arcade game of moderate difficulty for the whole family.

• More than 10 exciting levels

• 3 biomes with unique traps and obstacles



• Charming main character!

• Simplicity!



• Nostalgia!
